summary: Created branch feature/code-finder tracking same commit
Deleted local branch code-finder after switching to feature/code-finder
Documented Code Finder architecture and UX in docs/code-finder.md
Initialized codex-code-finder crate and added it to workspace
Stabilized codex-code-finder client HTTP builder timeout and query cache capacity without unsafe paths
Eliminated unwrap/expect usage across index classifiers, regex extraction helpers, and search matcher by introducing safe compile_regex helper
Hooked codex nav CLI to new code-finder client, removed unused timeout option, and added serde/uuid deps
Added serde and uuid workspace deps required by code finder CLI commands
Documented Code Finder commands in README and getting-started guide plus aligned CLI synopsis
Created CLI unit tests covering filter construction for codex nav variants
